医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
TxGNN 通过预测尚未获得批准的疗法的罕见疾病的治疗方法来改善药物的再利用新模型 TxGNN 通过预测未知疗法的疾病治疗方法，彻底改变了零次药物再利用，通过可解释的人工智能解释提供更高的准确性和信任度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/TxGNN-improves-drug-repurifying-by-predicting-treatments-for-rare-diseases-with-no-approved-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/TxGNN-improves-drug-repurifying-by-predicting-treatments-for-rare-diseases-with-no-approved-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb818ce4-f385-4680-b154-f4f31c163d0d Fri, 27 Sep 2024 00:12:00 -0400 TxGNN improves drug repurposing by predicting treatments for rare diseases with no approved therapies
研究人员创造出高性能、环保的防晒霜研究人员利用木质素（一种天然丰富的聚合物）和二氧化钛（TiO2）开发出一种新型防晒霜，这是化妆品行业的一项重大突破。由Yarong Li和Zhiguang Tang领导的这项研究发表在《生物资源与生物产品杂志》上，详细介绍了双改性木质素亚微球的创新用途，以增强防晒霜的SPF值并改善防晒霜的颜色。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Researchers-create-high-performing-eco-friend-sunscreen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Researchers-create-high-performing-eco-friend-sunscreen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=497add82-7233-4c8a-b715-f9cf355b9a9b Fri, 27 Sep 2024 00:01:40 -0400 Researchers create high-performing, eco-friendly sunscreen
计算研究确定了调节牵张反射的脊髓回路包括我们在内的动物的身体是如何成为如此精密的运动机器的？南加州大学阿尔弗雷德·E·曼生物医学工程系的弗朗西斯科·瓦莱罗-奎瓦斯实验室试图了解脊椎动物如何协调非自愿反射和无缝自愿运动之间永恒的拉锯战，这是一个谜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Computational-study-identizes-spinal-circ-that-modulates-stretch-reflexes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Computational-study-identizes-spinal-circ-that-modulates-stretch-reflexes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c448b8ba-e071-4ebc-819d-d4ab612adc05 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 23:57:55 -0400 Computational study identifies spinal circuit that modulates stretch reflexes
表观遗传开关控制意想不到的细胞类型中肾素的产生弗吉尼亚大学医学院的研究人员发现，某些细胞具有惊人的能力，可以改变其功能，帮助我们的身体控制血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Epigenic-switch-controls-renin-product-in-unexpected-cell-type.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Epigenic-switch-controls-renin-product-in-unexpected-cell-type.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e142a14-0bf9-4034-a5b1-0e65f8f9584b Thu, 26 Sep 2024 23:52:42 -0400 Epigenetic switch controls renin production in unexpected cell type
革命性蓝图旨在增强护士对患者治疗结果的影响最新一期《护理展望》中发表的一篇开创性文章提出了在急症和重症护理环境中衡量护理护理方式的重大转变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Revolutionary-blueprint-aims-to-enhance-nurses-impact-on-patent-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Revolutionary-blueprint-aims-to-enhance-nurses-impact-on-patent-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4676d76f-8b22-4624-ac15-096253c9b71a Thu, 26 Sep 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Revolutionary blueprint aims to enhance nurse's impact on patient outcomes
科学家揭开细胞孔形成的过程一种特殊的蛋白质 Gasdermin D 形成的毛孔在炎症反应中起着关键作用。在其激活过程中，抑制部分被分裂。然后，超过 30 个剩余的蛋白质片段结合在一起，在细胞膜上形成大孔，从而释放炎症信使。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Scientists-unravel-the-process-of-pore-formation-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Scientists-unravel-the-process-of-pore-formation-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=586aaa37-b697-40a7-a34b-2604e74d134f Thu, 26 Sep 2024 23:47:47 -0400 Scientists unravel the process of pore formation in cells
激素铁调素被确定为牛皮癣的潜在触发因素科学家可能已经发现了牛皮癣的根本原因，牛皮癣是一种慢性且有时使人衰弱的皮肤病，影响着全球 2-3% 的人口。这种疾病的特点是出现红色鳞状斑块，影响患者的生活质量，有时甚至危及生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Hormone-hepcidin-identified-as-pottial-trigger-for-psoriasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Hormone-hepcidin-identified-as-potential-trigger-for-psoriasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d64ae09-6683-4f0a-b508-1896aec06246 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 23:42:37 -0400 Hormone hepcidin identified as potential trigger for psoriasis
研究将早期机会与儿童的长期成功联系起来最新研究表明，儿童在成长过程中在家里、早期教育和保育、学校、课后项目以及社区中获得的教育机会数量与他们成年早期的教育程度和收入密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Study-links-early-opportunities-to-long-term-success-for-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Study-links-early-opportunities-to-long-term-success-for-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2a26d69-08bb-4b0a-9f33-31a48322c54d Thu, 26 Sep 2024 23:42:31 -0400 Study links early opportunities to long-term success for children
丝氨酸羟甲基转移酶的新见解有助于癌症药物设计仅在两次中子实验中，科学家们就发现了有关酶功能的显着细节，该酶可以帮助设计治疗侵袭性癌症的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/New-insights-into-丝氨酸-羟甲基转移酶-aid-cancer-drug-design.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/New-insights-into-丝氨酸-羟甲基转移酶-aid-cancer-drug-design.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4433563-0a68-4da3-bfe3-a07fb662ce35 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 23:36:24 -0400 New insights into serine hydroxymethyltransferase aid cancer drug design
研究发现隐藏的蛋白质会加剧心脏病和中风研究人员利用英国和中国生物库的遗传和观察分析，确定了与心血管疾病相关的关键蛋白质，并强调了药物开发的新目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Study-uncovers-hidden- Proteins-fueling-heart-disease-and-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Study-uncovers-hidden- Proteins-fueling-heart-disease-and-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d680b699-60a2-4bbd-b39d-9b9065015860 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 23:25:00 -0400 Study uncovers hidden proteins fueling heart disease and stroke
